name: The Ngenechén
description:
In a dark world, a tribe of goblins is oppressed by a powerful overlord, those brave enough to speak up immediately cut down. You are a pilot light, sparking rebellion by possessing goblins. Goblins shall be oppressed no longer! That is, if you can make it past the rain.

This game is wildly incomplete, technical issues and overconfidence being the main reasons. All it has is a semi-functional editor and art assets.

No art in this game may be re-used without explicit permission from KakekA.Github: https://github.com/FyreByrns/Pilot

Credits

Code by Gavin C White and Bee

Art by KakekA

Level Design by ching

Engine is a C# port of olcPixelGameEngine.h from http://www.onelonecoder.com
